review: Best thing ever. For about 30 bucks I was able to turn my TV into a semi-smart tv. As google gets more apps with casting, this thing will get better than ever. My only complaint is a very minor one, the fact that it isn't password protected. My roommate will prank me sometimes by connecting to the chromecast and sending some music video or something at like, 3 am. Harmless fun, just wonder what it would be like in a dorm situation or something where you might not like your roommate. All in all, very good device.
